title: Harry Potter And The Half Blood Prince multi 16 repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
Harry Potter And The Half Blood Prince full game

Repack features:

Do not cut / recoded
Voice Language: English
Subtitles: English,French,Italiano,Deutsch,Espanol,Portugues,Nederlands,Polski,Dansk,Svenskka,Magyar,Cesky,Portugues(Brasil),Suomi,Norsk
Precracked - install and play
Install Time - 2 minutes [Quad Core]
Final size: 4.33gb
Xbox 360 controller support: Yes
Operating system: Win Xp,Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit aand 64bit)
Year Of release(2009)

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual,, play the game from desktop shortcut....

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
